subject: Rugby (Game)
Soccer
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Northampton has embraced its team, and its greatest affection is reserved for a player who, if he had not been talented enough to make the team, would be sitting in the stands as a fan.
snippet: Northampton has embraced its team, and its greatest affection is reserved for a player who, if he had not been talented enough to make the team, would be sitting in the stands as a fan.
